Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: normal
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Paints the source image samples over the background image samples.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: multiply
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Multiplies the source image samples with the background image samples.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: screen
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Multiplies the inverse of the source image samples with the inverse of the background image samples, resulting in

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: overlay
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Either multiplies or screens the source image samples with the background image samples, depending on the background color.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: darken
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Creates the composite image samples by choosing the darker samples (either from the source image or the background).

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: lighten
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Creates the composite image samples by choosing the lighter samples (either from the source image or the background).

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: colorDodge
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Brightens the background image samples to reflect the source image samples. Source image sample values that specify black do not produce a change.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: colorBurn
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Darkens the background image samples to reflect the source image samples. Source image sample values that specify white do not produce a change.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: hardLight
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Either multiplies or screens colors, depending on the source image sample color.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: softLight
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Either darkens or lightens colors, depending on the source image sample color.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: difference
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Subtracts either the source image sample color from the background image sample color, or the reverse,

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: exclusion
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Produces an effect similar to that produced by BlendMode.difference, but with lower contrast.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: hue
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Uses the luminance and saturation values of the background with the hue of the source image.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: saturation
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Uses the luminance and hue values of the background with the saturation of the source image.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: color
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Uses the luminance values of the background with the hue and saturation values of the source image.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.name: luminosity
Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Uses the hue and saturation of the background with the luminance of the source image.

Enums/BlendMode.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics9.abstract: Set the blend mode of the current CGContext

Classes/Vector.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics6V.name: description
Classes/Vector.html#/s:13SwiftGraphics6V.abstract: A textual representation of this instance.
Adds two values and produces their sum.
Adds two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable
Add the specified value to a vector
Add the specified value to a vector
Subtracts one vector from another and produces their difference
Subtracts the second vector from the first and stores the difference in the left-hand-side variable
Subtracts one value from another and produces their difference, rounded to a representable value.
Subtracts the second value from the first and stores the difference in the left-hand-side variable.
Multiplies two values and produces their product
Multiplies two values and stores the result in the left-hand-side variable.
Multiplies two values and produces their product
Returns the quotient of dividing the first value by the second.
Divides the first value by the second and stores the quotient in the left-hand-side variable.
Returns the quotient of dividing the first value by the second.
Negate a Vector.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.
